alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 11:21AM AKDT until November 03 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow along the Anchorage Hillside. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Little to no additional accumulation in town. * WHERE...Anchorage and Eagle River Hillsides. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some periods of light snow will persist through the day in town but there should be little to no additional accumulation at lower elevations. The advisory is now for the higher elevations where an additional 2 to 4 inches of snow is possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
